cli/create-robo.title: ⚡ Create Robo
cli/create-robo.description: The create-robo interactive CLI is your go-to for kickstarting fresh Robo.js projects and plugins! It's a nifty standalone tool that won't bloat your project, and it'll hold your hand through the setup process like a pro.

cli/overview.title: ✨ CLI Tools
cli/overview.description: Robo.js provides a suite of CLI tools to help you build and manage your projects.

cli/robo.title: ⚙️ Robo CLI
cli/robo.description: The Robo.js CLI helps you manage your bot project like a boss. Here's a quick overview of the available commands and options, grouped by their purpose:

discord-activities/getting-started.title: ✨ Getting Started with Discord Activities
discord-activities/getting-started.description: Create a Discord Activity in seconds with Robo.js - a tiny framework that simplifies development of Discord Activities.

discord-activities/multiplayer.title: ⚔️ Multiplayer
discord-activities/multiplayer.description: Learn how to add multiplayer features to your Discord Activity using Robo.js for real-time communication between clients.

discord-activities/proxy.title: 🛡️ Discord Proxy
discord-activities/proxy.description: Learn how to make external network requests in your Discord Activity in a way compatible with the Discord Proxy.

discord-bots/commands.title: 📜 Commands
discord-bots/commands.description: Slash commands have changed the game in Discord, making it a breeze for users to interact with bots (or as we like to call them, Robos). And with Robo.js, weaving your own slash commands is as easy as pie. Let's unravel this together!

discord-bots/context-menu.title: 🖱️ Context Menu
discord-bots/context-menu.description: These are your quick, right-click interactions that swoop in when users right-click a message or a user. They may not boast options, descriptions, or command stacking like slash commands, but they shine in simplicity and context awareness. Choose between "Message" and "User" to suit the situation.

discord-bots/debug.title: 🐛 Debugging
discord-bots/debug.description: No code is perfect, and bugs are just part of the programming journey. But don't sweat it! Robo.js has got your back with nifty built-in features to help you squash those pesky bugs.

discord-bots/events.title: 📡 Events
discord-bots/events.description: Events are the real MVPs in bot development! They're the magical building blocks that make your bot come alive—everything, including commands, are built on top of events!

discord-bots/getting-started.title: ✨ Getting Started with Discord Bots
discord-bots/getting-started.description: Create a powerful Discord Bot in seconds with Robo.js - a tiny framework that simplifies Discord.js.

discord-bots/invite.title: 🏠 Inviting to Servers
discord-bots/invite.description: You've crafted an amazing Robo, and now it's time to bring it to life on your Discord Servers! To add your Robo, you'll need special invite links with the necessary permissions and scopes.

discord-bots/middleware.title: 🌙 Middleware
discord-bots/middleware.description: In the heart of your Robo, there lies a potent feature known as Middleware. These are functions that are executed before each and every command or event, granting you the ability to manipulate data, introduce conditional flows, and even halt execution of events or commands based on custom criteria.

discord-bots/migrate.title: ⭐ Migrating existing bots
discord-bots/migrate.description: Robo.js is a rad framework built on top of Discord.js. It's got a simple but powerful file structure, a better development experience, and loads of extra features, all while being 100% compatible with Discord.js code.

discord-bots/sage.title: 🔮 Sage Mode
discord-bots/sage.description: Your Robo is more than just a bot; it's got its very own spirit guide: Sage.

discord-bots/secrets.title: 🔑 Secrets
discord-bots/secrets.description: Keeping your project's sensitive info under wraps is a top priority. That's why we use a .env file to store critical values like API keys and tokens. It helps prevent accidentally sharing these secrets on platforms like GitHub.

getting-started.title: ✨ Getting Started
getting-started.description: Robo.js is a powerful framework for building epic Discord experiences.

hosting/overview.title: Hosting Overview
hosting/overview.description: Hosting your Robo.js project allows you to keep it running 24/7, so you can access it from anywhere at any time. No need to keep your computer on at all times, or worry about your internet connection.

hosting/roboplay.title: 🚀 RoboPlay
hosting/roboplay.description: Robo.js is built to work seamlessly with RoboPlay, a WavePlay service. They were built for each other from the ground up to make deploying and managing your Robo.js projects as easy as possible.

hosting/self-host.title: 🔨 Self-hosting
hosting/self-host.description: Robo.js can be self-hosted, meaning you can run your own instance of Robo.js on your own server.

plugins/ai.title: @robojs/ai
plugins/ai.description: This plugin morphs your Robo into a sophisticated AI chatbot. By simply mentioning it or replying to its messages on Discord, you initiate a natural conversation - as if you're chatting with a fellow human!

plugins/ai-voice.title: @robojs/ai-voice
plugins/ai-voice.description: Welcome to @robojs/ai-voice! This plugin is designed to seamlessly integrate with your existing Robo.js project and provide new features and enhancements to your robo. The best part? Everything automatically works once you install this plugin!

plugins/better-stack.title: @robojs/better-stack
plugins/better-stack.description: Welcome to @robojs/better-stack! This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Robo.js project, providing a comprehensive link to Better Stack, a renowned third-party service. With Better Stack, monitor your Robo's uptime and integrate logs in a visually appealing and searchable format.

plugins/create.title: 🌟 Creating Plugins
plugins/create.description: Developing a Robo plugin works in the same way as developing features for a Robo. Check out the overview section for more details on how to develop a plugin.

plugins/dev.title: @robojs/dev
plugins/dev.description: Welcome to @robojs/dev! For developers fine-tuning their Robo.js projects, this plugin is a must-have. Seamlessly test Robo APIs, monitor resources, and emulate specific Robo behaviors, all in one package. Just install, and you're ready to go!

plugins/directory.title: ✨ Plugin Directory
plugins/directory.description: Robo.js plugins are special. They let you add features to your Robo with one command and integrate seamlessly thanks to the Robo File Structure. What's more, anyone can create a plugin.

plugins/install.title: 🔌 Installing Plugins
plugins/install.description: Robo.js plugins are NPM packages at heart, but also need to be registered in your Robo's configuration.

plugins/maintenance.title: @robojs/maintenance
plugins/maintenance.description: Welcome to @robojs/maintenance! This plugin is designed to seamlessly integrate with your existing Robo.js project and provide new features and enhancements to your robo. The best part? Everything automatically works once you install this plugin!

plugins/moderation.title: @robojs/moderation
plugins/moderation.description: Tailored for Discord server management, this plugin includes a suite of commands essential for moderation. With enhanced features like anonymous warnings, attachment inclusion in reports, and comprehensive mod channel logs, it takes moderation to the next level.

plugins/overview.title: ✨ Robo Plugins
plugins/overview.description: Robo Plugins are special. They let you add features to your Robo with one command and integrate seamlessly thanks to the Robo File Structure. What's more, anyone can create a plugin.

plugins/server.title: @robojs/server
plugins/server.description: Elevate your Robo.js project with @robojs/server, a powerful plugin that provides an effortless way to create and manage web routes. This guide will walk you through the essentials of setting up and using the API plugin.

plugins/sync.title: @robojs/sync
plugins/sync.description: Real-time state sync across clients the simplest way possible. Perfect for multiplayer games and chat apps. It's like magic, but real! 🎩✨

robojs/config.title: 🛠️ Configuration
robojs/config.description: Customizing Robo.js to fit your needs is a piece of cake! 🍰 This guide will walk you through tweaking defaults, adding new intents, specifying permissions, changing sage mode behavior, and more.

robojs/files.title: 📂 Robo File Structure
robojs/files.description: The primary way to create with Robo.js is through the file structure. This is the foundation of Robo.js and is used to determine your project's functionality.

robojs/flashcore.title: ⚡ Flashcore Database
robojs/flashcore.description: Flashcore is your Robo's built-in database—ready to hold onto all the key-value pairs your Robo needs for the long haul. Trust us, it's a breeze to use!

robojs/internals.title: 👀 Understanding Internals
robojs/internals.description: Ready to understand how it comes alive? Here's a simplified overview of Robo.js's internals so you can get started with confidence.

robojs/linting.title: 💅 Linting
robojs/linting.description: Linting is like having a tiny coding assistant who keeps your code neat and tidy. It's super useful for catching and fixing annoying syntax and style issues before they become major headaches.

robojs/logger.title: 📝 Logger
robojs/logger.description: Effective logging is key to understanding and debugging your Robo.js projects. While you can use JavaScript's native console.log, Robo.js offers a more advanced logger object for enhanced logging capabilities.

robojs/mode.title: 🎭 Mode
robojs/mode.description: Modes are a way to define "profiles" for your Robo session. Each with its own config(s), envionment variables, and code.

robojs/modules.title: 📦 Modules
robojs/modules.description: Robo.js ain't just about power—it's all about keeping things neat and tidy too. That's where modules come in. Picture a module like a mini-bot, all packed up inside your main bot. You've got commands and events, all hanging out together under one roof.

robojs/portal.title: 🚪 Portal
robojs/portal.description: What if we told you there was a gateway to your Robo's brain? One that lets you tinker with the bits and bobs that make your bot tick? Well, get ready to step into the Portal. This API lets you access your Robo's inner workings and even tweak 'em without messing around with files. Now, that's power at your fingertips!

robojs/state.title: 💾 State Management
robojs/state.description: States are your Robo's personal memory bank. They store data, allowing your bot to remember information across its lifespan. However, states are ephemeral; they clear out when your Robo powers off.

robojs/typescript.title: 📘 TypeScript
robojs/typescript.description: TypeScript is like JavaScript's cooler cousin, ready to swoop in and save the day by catching those sneaky typos and helping you figure out what code exists. And guess what? It's super easy to learn, too! If you're already buds with JavaScript, hop on over to the W3Schools TypeScript Tutorial to kick things off!

templates/overview.title: ✨ Robo Templates
templates/overview.description: We have a collection of templates that you can use to kickstart your project or just use as a reference. Each one is designed to help you get started with Robo.js quickly and show what's possible.
